{"currentConversationId":"__NEW_AGENT__","agentExecutionMode":"manual","isPanelCollapsed":true,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"__NEW_AGENT__":{"id":"__NEW_AGENT__","createdAtIso":"2025-09-21T08:01:38.551Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-09-21T08:01:38.551Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"bf7ad29b-4b4d-42ca-890b-e5c72c46b476","uuid":"e7501a0a-dc04-4431-8210-e21cb35b6a4d","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1758441698551,"seen_state":"unseen"}],"feedbackStates":{},"toolUseStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"what you build

Mandate: Own the corpus. Fetch/clean/normalize → chunk → embed → upsert to Chroma with a stable schema. Light finetune experiments (Sprint 5) live here, not in API.

Scope (now)
	•	Datasets: seed CSV/JSON (programs, schools, GPA bands, tags, URLs). Later: IPEDS/College Scorecard/official program pages (scrape only where ToS allows).
	•	Preprocess: boilerplate removal, normalization, dedupe, entity linking (school ↔ program).
	•	Chunking: token-aware (~800 tokens; 100 overlap).
	•	Embeddings: choose one:
	•	via Ollama (/api/embeddings with nomic-embed-text)
	•	or sentence-transformers CPU model (e.g., all-MiniLM-L6-v2)
	•	Load: create Chroma collection; upsert with rich metadata.
	•	CLI: ingest, embed, load, refresh.
	•	Eval (basic): coverage, duplicates, avg chunk len; later RAGAS/retrieval QA.
